title: Vase, 1875–1900
markings: Marks: On bottom, in underglaze blue: "K/3/21"
provenance: Duke of Leinster, Co. Kildare, Ireland; Louis Wine Ltd., Dublin; 1959 WPW
description: Tall, reeded, 8-sided vase, straight-sided base swells to bulbous body, long thin neck, bulbous section top, flaring mouth; painted in underglaze blue on white with overall floral pattern, lambrequin border base, leaf border top bulbous section of body.

tombstone.epitaph:
Vase, 1875–1900.
1875–1900. earthenware, tin glaze. Bequest of Walter Phelps Warren. 1986-61-36.
